channel.title: Need help with posting pictures on to threads
channel.description: i have all my images saved in my paint program and i want it to go to my thread. can someone tell me how? please or guide me through. my hamachi is BlackMage Pk and pass is 123 if you want to pm me there instead:) or here is fine
